weather_report:
The weather in Evanston, Illinois, today presents crisp and cool conditions, characterized by a sunny vista that invites outdoor activity, even as temperatures hover in the mid 30s. With a gentle breeze sweeping in from the west, the environment feels a touch brisk, perfect for a refreshing stroll along the shoreline of Lake Michigan. As the day progresses, expect temperatures to peak near the high 30s, with a transition towards the afternoon bringing a noticeable drop.

Tonight, skies will cloud over, potentially delivering a slight chance of snow before the dawn breaks, as southwest winds whisper softly across the area. With lows around the mid 30s, layered attire will be recommended—perhaps a warm coat complemented by a hat—and as nighttime approaches, a light scarf may also be prudent. In terms of activities, the day remains ideal for those wishing to explore the stunning lakeshore or enjoy a warming beverage at a nearby café, taking advantage of the relatively pleasant weather. As we are not on a major holiday, the focus remains on enjoying the beauty of the season as it transitions into winter.
